about_the_game:
Factory Magnate is a casual factory game. Build factories, complete objectives, and unlock new production lines.

From a handful of natural resources, you'll build and design a large number of production lines to allow expansion and completion of objectives. As you complete objectives you'll unlock new machines and items to play with.

You win the game by completing the final objective. So yes, there is an end to this game.

The game has been in development for almost 4 years.

What you'll get

  • About 25 machines and buildings.
  • About 50 items, fluids and gases to produce and refine.
  • Objective-based, you'll always have a clearly defined goal to work towards.
  • Manageable depth and complexity; well suited for players who can't be bothered spending hours upon hours to study intricate production chains on wikis.
  • Procedurally generated maps.
  • Free future content updates.

What this game doesn't have

  • Enemies and combat. It's a peaceful game.
  • A character to control. You are free to navigate and build wherever you like.
  • Multiplayer.
  • Rocket launches.
